statement: People with cystic fibrosis have the results of all assessments they have had during the past year reviewed annually by a specialist multidisciplinary team.
People with cystic fibrosis have individual rooms with enâ€‘suite facilities when admitted to hospital as inpatients.
People with cystic fibrosis who have chronic Pseudomonas aeruginosa infection have sustained treatment with an inhaled antibiotic.
People with cystic fibrosis who have clinical evidence of lung disease are prescribed rhDNase as the first choice of mucoactive agent.
